name: ALTAR - AI-Powered Creative Engine
tagline: Autocomplete for your mind
description: ALTAR is an AI-powered workspace that organizes everything you save—notes, images, links—into a smart knowledge base. It learns what matters to you and helps you create, analyze, and find insights in seconds, helping you turn ideas into action without friction

name: MindPal
tagline: Turn your expertise into sharable AI agents that work 24/7
description: One platform for coaches, consultants, creators, and experts to package knowledge into shareable AI agents & multi-agent workflows that showcase expertise, generate leads, and create passive income scalably.

name: LearnPool ISO
tagline: A Platform where users earn from sharing verifiable facts
description: LearnPool is a gamified Web3 platform where users submit short, verified facts (Public Knowledge) to earn PK Stars, mint LearnNFTs, access gated features with $LEARN tokens, and get rewarded when their entry becomes the Highlight of the Day (HotD).

name: Locked In
tagline: Get twice done in half the time
description: I used to work for hours, but got nothing done. Checked X every 10 mins, hopped between podcast eps. No focus. So I build a tool to remove all distractions.

name: Amazon Nova Sonic
tagline: AI That Hears How You Speak
description: Nova Sonic is Amazon's Speech-to-speech AI on Bedrock. Understands how you speak (tone, pace) & responds with adaptive, expressive voice in real-time.

name: OmniHuman by ByteDance
tagline: An advanced AI-driven human video generation model
description: OmniHuman-1 is a cutting-edge AI framework by ByteDance that creates lifelike human videos from a single image and motion signals.

name: Celaro
tagline: The creative project tracker
description: Discover Celaro, a creative project tracker crafted for designers and developers to streamline workflows and boost creativity. Our vision is to bridge the gap between creatives and project management, without losing focus on what matters: creating.

name: LearnKit.io
tagline: Whiteboard + AI = The learning supertool you needed
description: Struggling to study? LearnKit turns learning into a visual, AI-assisted flow. Organize thoughts, get smart help, and create beautiful notes — without the stress. Built for students, dreamers, and neurodivergent minds.

name: NoteFlow
tagline: Mood-based productivity
description: NoteFlow is a free, AI-powered productivity app designed for students. It adapts to your mood, helps manage tasks, plays music, reduces distractions, and answers doubts. Stay focused, study smarter, and flow through your day effortlessly.

name: FastLogo AI
tagline: Create stunning logos in seconds — no design skills needed.
description: Generate unique and professional logos for your business using our AI-powered logo maker. Customize your designs and download high-resolution files.

name: Codewiser
tagline: From echoing answers to owning insight
description: CodeWiser is an AI-powered platform that helps you learn, not rely. Through quizzes, feedback, and adaptive challenges, it promotes critical thinking. Get original, AI-generated LeetCode-style questions to boost your interview prep and coding skills.

name: Better Marketing Blog
tagline: Marketing strategies that work for founders
description: We deliver actionable marketing playbooks specifically designed for early-stage founders. No fluff, no enterprise-only strategies—just practical templates, proven tactics, and step-by-step guides that help you acquire customers.

name: MarkdownMate
tagline: Vibe Coding? Stop your AI Agent from guessing.
description: Vibe coding only gets you so far. MarkdownMate gives your AI agent the context it needs to understand docs, write better code, and finish your project—fast. Works with Cursor, Copilot, and more. Free on the Chrome Web Store.

name: ChatComparison.ai
tagline: Compare 40+ AI Models in One Interface
description: Compare the best AI models including ChatGPT-4, Google Gemini, Claude 3.7 Sonnet, DeepSeek R1, Llama, Grok, Perplexity, Mixtral and 20+ more!

name: My Color Elf
tagline: Create Stunning Coloring Pages in Seconds
description: My Color Elf turns your ideas into custom coloring pages using AI. Just type what you want, and get a printable page in seconds. Great for parents, teachers, and anyone who loves to color something fun and totally unique.

name: Action Figure Generator
tagline: Transform photos into action figures
description: Create personalized action figures with our AI-powered Action Figure Generator. Turn your photos into collectible figurines.

name: Bokha
tagline: Food Allergy App Scanner
description: Bokha is an app that helps you identify allergens in products simply by scanning their barcodes.

name: Balang
tagline: The best IELTS writing checker
description: The best IELTS writing checker and more. Ace your IELTS with Balang's AI-powered tools, offering instant feedback for faster improvement and mastery of your English skills.

name: Danfe
tagline: AI-powered stock visualization and analysis app
description: Danfe is an AI stock app offering insider data, news analysis, and data visualization. Get actionable insights for smarter investments.

name: AlertyFast
tagline: Send WhatsApp alerts in minutes with a simple POST request
description: AlertyFast is a lightweight and powerful platform for sending WhatsApp notifications using just one API. Perfect for developers, SaaS, e-commerce, and any system that needs to keep users informed in real-time.
